contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name = Queensway | style = OC Transpo | type= '''[[Ottawa Rapid Transit|<span style="color:white;">Transitway</span>]] Station''' | image = Queensway Transitway Station looking south.jpg | image_size = | image_caption = | address = | coordinates = {{Coord|45|21|33|N|75|46|19|W|display=inline,title}} | line = <!-- line information is detailed under "services" --> | other = | structure = | platform = | depth = | levels = | tracks = | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = | owned = [[OC Transpo]] | zone = | former = | passengers = | pass_year = | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{s-rail|title=OC Transpo}} {{s-line|system=OC Transpo|line=Route 93|branch=Eastbound|previous=Pinecrest|next=Lincoln Fields}} {{s-line|system=OC Transpo|line=Route 94|previous=Iris|next=Lincoln Fields}} {{s-line|system=OC Transpo|line=Route 95|previous=Iris|next=Lincoln Fields}} {{s-line|system=OC Transpo|line=Route 96|branch=Eastbound|previous=Pinecrest|next=Lincoln Fields}} {{s-line|system=OC Transpo|line=Route 101|previous=Pinecrest|next=Carling}} | map_locator = }} '''Queensway Transitway Station''' is located around and under the [[Queensway (Ottawa)|Queensway]] along the southwest [[Ottawa Rapid Transit|transitway]] leg. The upper platforms provide access to the crosstown route 101, while the lower platforms are for transitway routes such as [[OC Transpo Route 95|route 95]] and eastbound trips of [[OC Transpo Route 96|route 96]]. Despite its seemingly isolated location, this station serves nearby residential areas through the bikepath which is to the west of the transit station. In the future, service from [[Kanata, Ontario|Kanata]], [[Stittsville, Ontario|Stittsville]] and [[Bayshore Station]] may not use this stop when the western transitway will be completed, although several years away. ==Service== {{see also|OC Transpo routes}} The following routes serve Queensway Station:<br> <span style="color:green;">70 71 73 76 77</span> 94 95 <span style="color:gray;">101 150</span> 152 172 <span style="color:gray;">178</span> <span style="color:orange;">205</span> <span style="color:blue;">4</span><span style="color:red;">0</span><span style="color:blue;">2</span> <span style="color:blue;">4</span><span style="color:red;">0</span><span style="color:blue;">6</span> '''<u>EASTBOUND ONLY</u>'''<br> <span style="color:green;">60am 61am 62am 65am 66am 68am 69am</span> 93 96 <span style="color:gray;">96A</span> <span style="color:red;">96Cam 96Dam 182pm</span> <span style="color:orange;">201am 203am</span> <span style="color:green;">261am 262am 263am 283am</span> <span style="color:blue;">4</span><span style="color:red;">0</span><span style="color:blue;">3</span> [[File:OCTranspo QueenswayStation Plat4A.jpg|thumb|left|Platform 4A, serving eastbound Queensway/417]] {{clear left}} ==External links== *[http://www.octranspo1.com/images/files/station_maps/QWY.gif OC Transpo station page] *[http://www.octranspo1.com/images/files/area_maps/QWY.gif OC Transpo Area map] {{OC Transpo Rapid Transit}} [[Category:OC Transpo]] {{bus-stub}} {{ottawa-stub}}
